snippet.title: V-Jump Chrono Trigger Preview Video [VHS Rip]
snippet.description:
A digital rip of a brief promotional VHS tape that V-Jump magazine distributed to help hype up Chrono Trigger—a game featuring character designs, of course, by Jump's popular manga artist Akira Toriyama (R.I.P.). 

Recorded from a JVC S-VHS deck and upscaled to 720p via RetroTink 5X. 

Please feel free to use clips from this video in your own work—all I ask is that you give me a nod as your source credit. Enjoy!
